otp.group6.audioeditor

Class Soundboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • otp.group6.audioeditor.Soundboard

  • public class Soundboard
extends java.lang.Object
    Soundboard class for storing and playing sampled audio
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Kevin Akkoyun

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Soundboard.Sample
      Class for handling playable audio files as objects

      Localization name variable

      Audio player object

      an ArrayList that contains all Sample data
      private java.lang.String sampleData
      Sample data string for saving

      Reads Soundboard.Sample data from text file and adds valid lines to sampleArray

      • stopSample

        public void stopSample()
        Stops the SoundboardPlayer output and closes audio

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Method to check if SoundboardPlayer is active
        Returns:
        returns true if player is active; otherwise returns false if player is null or not playing

      • validateSampleArray

        public void validateSampleArray()
        Shortens sampleArray until its size is 20

      • saveSampleData

        public void saveSampleData()
        Saves Soundboard.Sample data to a text file
        Uses ; to separate sample name and path.

      • readSampleData

        public int readSampleData()
        Reads Soundboard.Sample data from text file and adds valid lines to sampleArray

        Returns:
        Returns the size of sampleArray
